name: OmniGraffle Template
summary: A GTEMPLATE file is a diagram template created by OmniGraffle diagramming and sketching software for macOS. It contains a diagram, similar to a .GRAFFLE file, which includes the layout dimensions, styles, and default elements for a diagram. GTEMPLATE files are used to produce multiple diagrams with a similar look and feel.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: GTEMPLATE file open in The Omni Group OmniGraffle 7
